    SOLIDATA backend API


    Solidata is a microservice (a REST API) for data management and authentication based on access and refresh JSON Web Tokens (JWT)

    • Building a public service for managing, consolidating, and sharing "API-fied" data
    • compatible with the TADATA! sofware suite : ApiViz / Solidata_frontend / Toktok / OpenScraper
